test.name: TC_001 Book flight tickets on Makemytrip Application

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Page Should Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` is found on the current page.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.arg: //body/div[@id='root']/div[@class='bgGradient webpSupport']/div[@class='minContainer']/div/div[contains(@class,'widgetSection appendBottom40 primaryTraveler')]/div[@class='fsw widgetOpen']/div[@class='fsw_inner returnPersuasion']/div[@class='fsw_inputBox flightTravllers inactiveWidget activeWidget']/div[@class='travellers gbTravellers']/div[@class='appendBottom20']/ul[@class='guestCounter font12 darkText gbCounter']/li[${TravellerNo}]
kw.msg: Clicking element '//body/div[@id='root']/div[@class='bgGradient webpSupport']/div[@class='minContainer']/div/div[contains(@class,'widgetSection appendBottom40 primaryTraveler')]/div[@class='fsw widgetOpen']/div[@class='fsw_inner returnPersuasion']/div[@class='fsw_inputBox flightTravllers inactiveWidget activeWidget']/div[@class='travellers gbTravellers']/div[@class='appendBottom20']/ul[@class='guestCounter font12 darkText gbCounter']/li[2]'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Double Click Element
kw.doc: Double clicks the element identified by ``locator``.
